article_title: Carolinas HealthCare CEO paid $5.3 million in 2014
article_text: In a year when Carolinas HealthCare System eliminated 100 management positions as part of a goal to cut $110million from its 2015 budget, the system’s CEO Michael Tarwater received $5.3million in total compensation in 2014, an increase of 7.7percent over the previous year.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Carolinas HealthCare System, Michael Tarwater, executive compensation, Novant Health
article_metadata.title: Carolinas HealthCare CEO paid $5.3 million in 2014 | The Charlotte Observer
